channel.title: Ok i need a little help guys
channel.description:
not meaning to sound like a total fricken idiot im new to editing stuff
please someone gimme a hand and tell me how i can go edit the java class and what they need editing to
when i hit compile
i get the following message.. : javac is not recognised as an internal or external command.
any help would be greatly! appreciated thanks in advance peeps.

item.source: Ok i need a little help guys

item.title: Ok i need a little help guys
item.dc:creator: @jwess jwess
item.description:
@jwess wrote:

have u done this??

right click My Computer, click Properties, click the Advanced tab, then click Environment Variables

in the bottom box(System Variables)…

double click CLASSPATH
(if it doesnt exist click New and Variale Name is CLASSPATH)
under Variable Value put…
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin
(if there i anything already in Variable Value put a ; after what is there then put in what it up above)
click OK

double click Path
(if it doesnt exist click New and Variale Name is Path)
under Variable Value put…
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin
(if there i anything already in Variable Value put a ; after what is there then put in what it up above)
click OK

Read full topic
